purpose: Facilitates the building of real-time knowledge graphs to empower AI agents with contextual understanding and dynamic information retrieval.
principle: Leverages graph databases and real-time data processing to construct and maintain knowledge graphs that can be queried and updated dynamically.
reusability: Offers APIs for seamless integration with various AI systems, allowing for customizable graph structures and data inputs.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for certain graph operations and scalability issues with large datasets.
name: graphiti
description: Build Real-Time Knowledge Graphs for AI Agents
highlight: Enables the creation of real-time knowledge graphs for AI agents, enhancing their ability to process and utilize complex data relationships.
